5. metrics module¶

metrics.padded_accuracy(logits, labels)¶

Percentage of times that predictions matches labels on non-0s.

metrics.padded_cross_entropy_loss(logits, labels, smoothing, vocab_size)¶

Calculate cross entropy loss while ignoring padding. :param logits: Tensor of size [batch_size, length_logits, vocab_size] :param labels: Tensor of size [batch_size, length_labels] :param smoothing: Label smoothing constant, used to determine the on and off values :param vocab_size: int size of the vocabulary

戻り値

float32 tensors with

shape [batch_size, max(length_logits, length_labels)]

戻り値の型

Returns the cross entropy loss and weight tensors
